page.title: 10JOBS IN OULTON BROAD.
page.content: In Oulton Broad most people are retired but some people have jobs. They are lucky, but the jobs do not make very good money. Some people have good jobs, for example you can get very good money by working on the oil rigs. Some people have jobs which are not worth doing, for example you don't get paid much for making calculators. Some people are to young to go to work but most are too old to work.There are not really many jobs left for the younger generation. The few jobs that are left are not paying out much.Many more people will be out of work because people are being replaced by machines to do jobs for them. Some people will have jobs fixing the machines.
